name: Gone Mad
description:
Gone mad is a 2d platformer, the player slowly digresses into madness. How to play   1. Download game   2. Extract the zip   3. Open "Gone Mad.exe" and enjoy! Credits

SFX: Some by me - others from Kenny.nl

Music from: gamesounds.xyz
